title: This is the estimated net worth of each Kardashian/Jenner woman - combined it's more than R23 billion
text:
The Kardashian/Jenner ladies are known for their wealthy status and various money-making ventures.

Ranging in age from 22 to 69, these ladies are worth an estimated $1.6 billion (R23.6 billion) collectively.

Here's a breakdown of each Kardashian/Jenner woman and their estimated net worth:



Model - Kendall Jenner $30 million (R441 million)

READ MORE: From Basketball Wives to The Kardashians, here are 4 ways to use reality shows as a guide to living your best life

Owner and designer at POOSH - Kourtney Kardashian $35 million (R514 million)

Reality star and influencer - Khloé Kardashian $40 million (R587 million)

'Momager' - Kris Jenner $60 million (R881 million)

Retired athlete and reality star - Caitlyn Jenner $100 million (R1.4 billion)

Skims, KKW Beauty - Kim Kardashian West $350 million (R5.1 billion)

Kylie Cosmetics - Kylie Jenner $1 billion (R14.7 billion)

Compiled by Phelokazi Mbude

description: The Kardashian/Jenner ladies are known for their wealthy status and various money-making ventures.
